conditions: This operative cannot perform this action while within control range of an enemy operative.

actions.name: Malefic Vortex
effects: PSYCHIC. Remove your Malefic Vortex marker from the killzone (if any). Then place your Malefic Vortex marker visible to this operative, or on Vantage terrain of a terrain feature that’s visible to this operative. Inflict 1 damage on each enemy operative within 2" of that marker. In addition, in the Ready step of each Strategy phase, inflict 1 damage on each enemy operative within 2" of that marker. This operative cannot perform this action while within control range of an enemy operative.

operatives.name: CHAOS DEVOTEE
operatives.description: These Cultists are the mortal followers of the Dark Gods – ordinary men and women fallen to promises of temporal power who wish to overthrow Imperial taskmasters. Bearing a motley collection of improvised, stolen and makeshift weapons, they can overwhelm even determined enemies with their sheer zeal.
operatives.keywords: CHAOS CULT, Chaos, Operative, Devotee

abilities.name: Group Activation
abilities.rules: Whenever this operative is expended, you must then activate one other ready friendly CHAOS CULT DEVOTEE operative (if able) before your opponent activates. When that other operative is expended, your opponent then activates as normal (in other words, you cannot activate more than two operatives in succession with this rule).

operatives.name: CHAOS MUTANT
operatives.description: Whether born of dark ritual, empyric experimentation or the predations of malign entities, Mutants have diverse, terrifying origins. When faced with an enemy, they lash out with claws, tendrils or whatever other blasphemous appendage they possess.
operatives.keywords: Operative, CHAOS CULT, Chaos, Mutant

abilities.name: Accursed Mutant
abilities.rules: This operative cannot perform unique actions. You must spend 1 additional AP for this operative to perform the Pick Up Marker and mission actions (excluding Operate Hatch).

operatives.name: CHAOS TORMENT
operatives.keywords: Operative, CHAOS CULT, Chaos, Torment

abilities.name: Accursed Torment
abilities.rules: This operative cannot use any weapons that aren't on its datacard, perform the Pick Up Marker, unique or mission actions (excluding Operate Hatch).

abilities.name: Brute
abilities.rules: Whenever your opponent is selecting a valid target, if this operative has a Conceal order, it cannot use Light terrain for cover. While this can allow this operative to be targeted (assuming it’s visible), it doesn’t remove its cover save (if any).

strategy_ploys.name: CREATURES OF NIGHTMARE
strategy_ploys.description: The twisted and unnatural forms of these accursed monstrosities inspire abject terror.
strategy_ploys.rules: Whenever determining control of a marker, treat the total APL stat of enemy operatives that contest it as 1 lower if at least one of those enemy operatives is within 2" of friendly CHAOS CULT MUTANT or CHAOS CULT TORMENT operatives. Note this isn’t a change to the APL stat, so any changes are cumulative with this.

strategy_ploys.name: SICKENING AURA
strategy_ploys.description: Sickening corruption flows from the hideous form of Mutant and Torment, eroding the sanity and strength of those who gaze upon them.
strategy_ploys.rules: Whenever an enemy operative is within 2" of a friendly CHAOS CULT MUTANT or CHAOS CULT TORMENT operative, worsen the Hit stat of that enemy operative’s weapons by 1. This isn’t cumulative with being injured.

firefight_ploys.name: FAITHFUL FOLLOWER
firefight_ploys.description: The teeming masses of a Chaos Cult will gladly sacrifice their own wretched lives to preserve their unholy superiors.
firefight_ploys.rules: Use this firefight ploy when a friendly CHAOS CULT DARK COMMUNE operative is selected as the valid target of a Shoot action or to fight against during the Fight action. Select one other friendly CHAOS CULT operative (excluding DARK COMMUNE) visible to and within 3" of that DARK COMMUNE operative to become the valid target or to be fought against (as appropriate) instead (even if it wouldn’t normally be valid for this). If it’s the Fight action, treat that other operative as being within the fighting operative’s control range for the duration of that action. If it’s the Shoot action, that other operative is only in cover or obscured if the original target was.

equipment.name: COVERT GUISES
equipment.description: The most insidious of Chaos Cults are masters of infiltration, disguise and betrayal.
equipment.rules: After revealing this equipment option, roll one D3. As a STRATEGIC GAMBIT in the first turning point, a number of friendly CHAOS CULT DEVOTEE operatives equal to the result that are wholly within your drop zone can immediately perform a free Reposition action, but must end that move wholly within 3" of your drop zone.

rules.name: MUTATION
rules.description: During the battle, friendly CHAOS CULT operatives can MUTATE as follows: • As a STRATEGIC GAMBIT, you can MUTATE a number of friendly CHAOS CULT operatives based on the turning point as follows: TP1 = 2, TP2 = 2, TP3 = 3, TP4+ = 4. • Whenever a friendly DEVOTEE operative incapacitates an enemy operative within its control range, it can MUTATE. • Each operative cannot MUTATE more than once per turning point. Whenever a friendly operative MUTATES, select one of the following: • If it’s a DEVOTEE operative, turn it into a MUTANT operative. • If it’s a MUTANT operative, turn it into a TORMENT operative (max twice per turning point). • It can regain up to D3+1 lost wounds. You cannot have more than five MUTANT operatives and three TORMENT operatives at once. Whenever a friendly operative turns into a new operative: • Swap the miniatures, ensuring the centre of the new miniature’s base is as close as possible to where the centre of the old miniature’s base was. This can put it within control range of enemy operatives, and if the old miniature was, the new miniature must be if possible. • The new operative type loses a number of wounds equal to the lost wounds of its preceding operative type. • It’s still the same operative for any rules it’s already been selected for. The operative is simply a new operative type and will use that new type’s miniature and datacard rules.
rules.rules: During the battle, friendly CHAOS CULT operatives can MUTATE as follows: • As a STRATEGIC GAMBIT, you can MUTATE a number of friendly CHAOS CULT operatives based on the turning point as follows: TP1 = 2, TP2 = 2, TP3 = 3, TP4+ = 4. • Whenever a friendly DEVOTEE operative incapacitates an enemy operative within its control range, it can MUTATE. • Each operative cannot MUTATE more than once per turning point. Whenever a friendly operative MUTATES, select one of the following: • If it’s a DEVOTEE operative, turn it into a MUTANT operative. • If it’s a MUTANT operative, turn it into a TORMENT operative (max twice per turning point). • It can regain up to D3+1 lost wounds. You cannot have more than five MUTANT operatives and three TORMENT operatives at once. Whenever a friendly operative turns into a new operative: • Swap the miniatures, ensuring the centre of the new miniature’s base is as close as possible to where the centre of the old miniature’s base was. This can put it within control range of enemy operatives, and if the old miniature was, the new miniature must be if possible. • The new operative type loses a number of wounds equal to the lost wounds of its preceding operative type. • It’s still the same operative for any rules it’s already been selected for. The operative is simply a new operative type and will use that new type’s miniature and datacard rules.

name: CORSAIR VOIDSCARRED
description: Corsairs are avaricious raiders grouped together by charismatic commanders who draw their members from both craftworlds and the Dark City. The most experienced of Corsairs are the Corsair Voidscarred, each of whom possesses their own unique combat skills and have been hardened by several lifetimes of voidfaring and piracy.

selection.operatives: ↘ 1 Corsair Voidscarred FELARCH operative with one of the following options: ○ Shuriken rifle; shuriken pistol; power weapon ○ Neuro disruptor; power weapon ↘ 8 Corsair Voidscarred operatives selected from the following list: • FATE DEALER • GUNNER with one of the following options: ○ Blaster ; shuriken pistol; fists ○ Shredder; shuriken pistol; fists • HEAVY GUNNER with one of the following options: ○ Shuriken cannon; shuriken pistol; fists ○ Shuriken pistol; wraithcannon ; fists • KURNATHI • KURNITE HUNTER • SHADE RUNNER • SOUL WEAVER • STARSTORM DUELLIST • WARRIOR with one of the following options: ○ Shuriken pistol; power weapon ○ Shuriken rifle; fists • WAY SEEKER Other than WARRIOR operatives, your kill team can only include each operative on this list once. Your kill team cannot include both a blaster and a wraithcannon.

operatives.name: VOIDSCARRED FELARCH
operatives.description: Felarchs are veteran Corsairs, with centuries or even millennia of experience reaving the stars. They have fought countless different races and mastered numerous weapons, making them deadly enemies for any who face them.
operatives.keywords: Leader, Aeldari, Corsair Voidscarred, Anhrathe, Felarch

abilities.name: Veteran Raider
abilities.rules: This operative can perform a 1AP action for free during their activation as a result of the Aeldari Raiders rule (instead of the Dash action).

abilities.name: One Step Ahead
abilities.rules: Once per battle, after an enemy operative performs an action during its activation, if this operative is ready, you can use this rule. If you do, roll one D6: if the result is higher than that enemy operative’s APL stat, you can interrupt that activation and immediately perform either a free Shoot or a free Fight action with this operative, but other enemy operatives cannot be selected as a valid target or to fight against during that action (note that secondary targets from the Blast weapon rule can still be targeted). After you perform that action, subtract 1 from this operative’s APL stat until the end of its next activation.

operatives.name: VOIDSCARRED FATE DEALER
operatives.description: Once a Fate Dealer has an enemy in their sights, it is the mark of the unfortunate soul’s death. Expert infiltrators, they hide in positions with greatest oversight of the whole battlefield, and are rendered all but invisible by camo cloaks.
operatives.keywords: Operative, Corsair Voidscarred, Aeldari, Anhrathe, Fate Dealer

abilities.name: Camo Cloak
abilities.rules: Whenever an operative is shooting this operative: • Ignore the Saturate weapon rule. • If you can retain any cover saves, you can retain one additional cover save, or you can retain one cover save as a critical success instead. This isn’t cumulative with improved cover saves from Vantage terrain.

operatives.name: VOIDSCARRED GUNNER
operatives.description: Corsairs utilise weapons hailing from every Aeldari society. Shredders unleash an expanding mesh of monofilament, entangling foes in a net and slicing them apart, while blasters use mysterious darklight technology, lethal even to the most armoured foe.
operatives.keywords: Operative, Corsair Voidscarred, Aeldari, Anhrathe, Gunner

operatives.name: VOIDSCARRED HEAVY GUNNER
operatives.keywords: Operative, Corsair Voidscarred, Aeldari, Anhrathe, Heavy Gunner

operatives.name: VOIDSCARRED KURNATHI
operatives.description: The Kurnathi are true blademasters. Assassins all, they have learned their bloody trade in Asuryani Aspect Shrines, in the arenas of Commorragh or even alongside the Harlequins. Now they put their skills to work however they see fit.
operatives.keywords: Operative, Aeldari, Anhrathe, Corsair Voidscarred, Kurnathi

abilities.name: Blademaster
abilities.rules: This operative can perform the Dash action during an activation in which it performed the Charge action, but can only use any remaining move distance it had from that Charge action (to a maximum of 3").

abilities.name: Bladed Stance
abilities.rules: Whenever this operative is fighting or retaliating, you can resolve one of your successes before the normal order. If you do, that success must be used to block.

operatives.name: VOIDSCARRED KURNITE HUNTER
operatives.keywords: Corsair Voidscarred, Operative, Aeldari, Anhrathe, Kurnite Hunter

abilities.name: Faolchú's Bond
abilities.rules: The first time during each turning point that this operative is retaliating, if it's ready, in the Resolve Attack Dice step of that sequence, you resolve the first attack dice (i.e. defender instead of attacker).

abilities.name: Erudite Hunter
abilities.rules: STRATEGIC GAMBIT. Select one enemy operative within 9" of this operative. Once during this turning point, after that enemy operative performs an action in which it moves during its activation, you can interrupt that activation to use this rule. If you do, this operative can immediately perform either a free Reposition action (it cannot end that move further from that enemy operative), or a free Charge action (you can change its order to do so, and it must end that move within control range of that enemy operative).

operatives.name: VOIDSCARRED SHADE RUNNER
operatives.keywords: Operative, Corsair Voidscarred, Aeldari, Anhrathe, Shade Runner

abilities.name: Blink pack
abilities.rules: Whenever this operative performs the Charge, Fall Back or Reposition action, it can warp jump. If it does, don’t move it. Instead, remove it from the killzone and set it back up wholly within 7" of its original location, measuring the horizontal distance only (in Killzone: Gallowdark, this distance can be measured through walls). It must be set up in a location it can be placed, and unless it’s the Charge action, it cannot be set up within control range of enemy operatives. This operative cannot warp jump during the same activation in which it performed the Dash action (or vice-versa).

abilities.name: Slicing Attack
abilities.rules: Whenever this operative performs the Reposition action with a warp jump (see Blink Pack), you can use this rule. If you do, after it moves, draw an imaginary line 1mm in diameter and up to 7" long between it and its previous location. Note this doesn’t have to be a straight line. Inflict D3+2 damage on one enemy operative that line crosses. You cannot inflict damage on an enemy operative that was not visible to this operative at the start of that action. A 28mm round marker can be temporarily placed underneath this operative before it moves to help determine this.

operatives.name: VOIDSCARRED SOUL WEAVER
operatives.keywords: Operative, Corsair Voidscarred, Aeldari, Anhrathe, Soul Weaver, Psyker, Medic

actions.name: Soul Channel
effects: ▶ PSYCHIC. Select one other friendly Corsair Voidscarred operative visible to and within 6" of this operative. Until the end of that operative’s next activation, add 1 to its APL stat.
conditions: This operative cannot perform this action while within control range of an enemy operative.

actions.name: Soul Heal
effects: ▶ PSYCHIC. Select one friendly Corsair Voidscarred operative visible to and within 6" of this operative. That operative regains 2D3 lost wounds.
conditions: This operative cannot perform this action while within control range of an enemy operative.

operatives.name: VOIDSCARRED STARSTORM DUELLIST
operatives.keywords: Operative, Corsair Voidscarred, Aeldari, Anhrathe, Starstorm Duellist

abilities.name: Quick on the Trigger
abilities.rules: This operative can perform the Shoot action while within control range of an enemy operative. If it does, when selecting a valid target, you can only select an enemy operative within this operative’s control range, and can do so even if other friendly operatives are within that enemy operative’s control range.

actions.name: Pistol Barrage
effects: ▶ Perform two free Shoot actions with this operative (this takes precedence over action restrictions). You must select its fusion pistol for one action and its shuriken pistol for the other (in any order).
conditions: This operative cannot perform this action while it has a Conceal order, or during an activation in which it performed the Shoot action (or vice versa).

operatives.name: VOIDSCARRED WARRIOR
operatives.keywords: Operative, Corsair Voidscarred, Aeldari, Anhrathe, Warrior

abilities.name: Prowling Raiders
abilities.rules: You can use the Capricious Flight and Light Fingers firefight ploys for 0CP each if a friendly WARRIOR operative is the specified Corsair Voidscarred operative.

operatives.name: VOIDSCARRED WAY SEEKER
operatives.keywords: Operative, Corsair Voidscarred, Aeldari, Anhrathe, Psyker, Way Seeker

actions.name: Warp Fold
effects: ▶ PSYCHIC. Select two friendly Corsair Voidscarred operatives visible to and within 5" of this operative. Remove them both from the killzone and set them back up in each other’s previous locations (in other words, swap their positions). If one of them performed the Charge, Fall Back or Reposition action during this turning point and the other is ready, the other cannot perform any of those actions in its activation during this turning point.
conditions: This operative cannot perform this action while within control range of an enemy operative.

actions.name: Warding Shield
effects: ▶ PSYCHIC. Select one friendly Corsair Voidscarred operative visible to and within 6" of this operative. Until the start of this operative’s next activation, until it’s incapacitated or until it performs this action again (whichever comes first), the first time an attack dice inflicts Normal Dmg on that friendly operative, ignore that inflicted damage.
conditions: This operative cannot perform this action while within control range of an enemy operative.

strategy_ploys.name: PIRATICAL PROFITEERS
strategy_ploys.description: Any foolish enough to attempt to contest a prize claimed by the Corsair Voidscarred will soon find themselves caught in a blizzard of shuriken fire and sword thrusts.
strategy_ploys.rules: Whenever a friendly Corsair Voidscarred operative is shooting, fighting or retaliating, if it or the enemy operative in that sequence contests an objective marker or one of your mission markers, that friendly operative’s weapons have the Balanced weapon rule.

firefight_ploys.name: CAPRICIOUS FLIGHT
firefight_ploys.description: CAPRICIOUS FLIGHT
firefight_ploys.rules: Use this firefight ploy during a friendly Corsair Voidscarred operative’s activation, before or after it performs an action.

equipment.name: RUNE OF PROPHECY
equipment.rules: Once per battle, after rolling off to decide initiative, you can add D3 to, or subtract D3 from, your result.

equipment.name: RUNE OF SHIELDING
equipment.rules: Once per battle, when an attack dice inflicts Normal Dmg on a friendly Blades of Khaine operative, you can ignore that inflicted damage.

equipment.name: RUNE OF FORESIGHT
equipment.rules: When this equipment is revealed, roll one D3. In the Strategy phase of the turning point equal to the result, you gain 1 additional CP.

equipment.name: WRAITHBONE TALISMAN
equipment.rules: Once per turning point, when a friendly Blades of Khaine operative is shooting, fighting or retaliating, if you roll two or more fails, you can discard one of them to retain another as a normal success instead.

rules.name: RIFLES
rules.description: Whenever a friendly Corsair Voidscarred operative is shooting with a shuriken rifle or ranger long rifle during an activation in which it hasn’t performed the Charge, Fall Back or Reposition action, that weapon has the Accurate 1 weapon rule. Note that operative isn’t restricted from performing those actions after shooting.
rules.rules: Whenever a friendly Corsair Voidscarred operative is shooting with a shuriken rifle or ranger long rifle during an activation in which it hasn’t performed the Charge, Fall Back or Reposition action, that weapon has the Accurate 1 weapon rule. Note that operative isn’t restricted from performing those actions after shooting.

rules.name: AELDARI RAIDERS
rules.description: Each friendly Corsair Voidscarred operative can perform a free Dash action during their activation.
rules.rules: Each friendly Corsair Voidscarred operative can perform a free Dash action during their activation.

name: DEATH KORPS
description: Grim, fatalistic and utterly uncompromising, the Death Korps of Krieg are famed for their endurance and ability to do battle in the most horrific conditions. Death Korps kill teams are made up of veteran specialists who have seen more fighting that many Astra Militarum soldiers will experience in their entire lifetime.

selection.operatives: ↘ 1 Death Korps WATCHMASTER operative with the following: ○ Boltgun; bayonet Or one option from each of the following: ○ Bolt pistol, plasma pistol or relic laspistol ○ Chainsword or power weapon ↘ 4 TROOPER operatives ↘ 9 Death Korps operatives selected from the following list: • BRUISER • CONFIDANT with one of the following options: ○ Boltgun or lasgun; bayonet ○ Bolt pistol or relic laspistol; chainsword • GUNNER with bayonet and flamer • GUNNER with bayonet and grenade launcher • GUNNER with bayonet and meltagun • GUNNER with bayonet and plasma gun • MEDIC • SAPPER • SNIPER • SPOTTER • TROOPER • VETERAN • VOX-OPERATOR • ZEALOT Other than TROOPER operatives, your kill team can only include each operative on this list once. Up to four times, instead of selecting one of these TROOPER operatives, you can select one Death Korps ploy to cost you 0CP for the battle.

operatives.name: DEATH KORPS WATCHMASTER
operatives.description: Watchmasters command squads of Death Korps in battle. Calm under pressure and unphased by the horrors of war, they are solid combat leaders who will fight tooth and nail to achieve victory as well as see their comrades survive to fight another day.
operatives.keywords: Leader, Death Korps, Watchmaster, Imperium, Astra Militarum

abilities.name: Adaptive Orders
abilities.rules: If this operative doesn’t issue a GUARDSMAN ORDER as a STRATEGIC GAMBIT, you can use the Inspirational Leadership firefight ploy for 0CP during this operative’s activation.

operatives.name: DEATH KORPS CONFIDANT
operatives.description: Even the best Watchmasters need to call on solid tactical advice • and their Confidants are experts. Experienced troops and capable leaders themselves, they can be trusted to carry out the Watchmaster’s orders in the field as well as contribute to the formulation of a solid battle plan.
operatives.keywords: Imperium, Astra Militarum, Confidant, Requisitioned Operatives, Inquisitorial Agent, Death Korps

abilities.name: Second in Command
abilities.rules: If a friendly WATCHMASTER operative is incapacitated and removed from the killzone, you can use this rule. If you do, until the end of the battle, this operative can issue a GUARDSMAN ORDER as a STRATEGIC GAMBIT (even though it’s not a WATCHMASTER operative).

abilities.name: Directive
abilities.rules: Whenever this operative is activated, if you haven’t used the Second in Command rule during the battle, you can select one other ready friendly INQUISITORIAL AGENT operative visible to and within 6" of it. When this operative is expended, activate that other friendly operative before your opponent activates (if that operative is a TROOPER, ignore its Group Activation rule).

operatives.name: DEATH KORPS BRUISER
operatives.description: For some, war and fighting just agrees with them. Bruisers are such people. They look the galaxy’s endless malevolent threats in the eye with a trench club in their hand, ready to bludgeon anything and everything to death.
operatives.keywords: Imperium, Astra Militarum, Bruiser, Death Korps, Requisitioned Operatives, Inquisitorial Agent

abilities.name: Bruiser
abilities.rules: Once per turning point, when this operative is fighting or retaliating, in the Resolve Attack Dice step, you can ignore the damage inflicted on it from one normal success.

operatives.name: DEATH KORPS GUNNER
operatives.keywords: Imperium, Astra Militarum, Gunner, Death Korps, Inquisitorial Agent, Requisitioned Operatives

operatives.name: DEATH KORPS MEDIC
operatives.description: The efforts of the Medic is all that stands between life and miserable death for the troops of his squad. Equipped with little more than basic medical equipment, they strive to keep their comrades alive in the most hazardous conditions.
operatives.keywords: Imperium, Astra Militarum, Medic, Requisitioned Operatives, Inquisitorial Agent, Death Korps

abilities.name: Medic!
abilities.rules: The first time during each turning point that another friendly INQUISITORIAL AGENT operative would be incapacitated while visible to and within 3" of this operative, you can use this rule, providing neither this nor that operative is within control range of an enemy operative. If you do, that friendly operative isn’t incapacitated and has 1 wound remaining and cannot be incapacitated for the remainder of the action. After that action, that friendly operative can immediately perform a free Dash action, but must end that move within this operative’s control range. Subtract 1 from this and that operative’s APL stats until the end of their next activations respectively, and if this rule was used during that friendly operative’s activation, that activation ends. You cannot use this rule if this operative is incapacitated, or if it's a Shoot action and this operative would be a primary or secondary target.

actions.name: Death Korps Medic
effects: ▶ Select one friendly INQUISITORIAL AGENT operative within this operative’s control range to regain up to 2D3 lost wounds. It cannot be an operative that the Medic! rule was used on during this turning point.
conditions: This operative cannot perform this action while within control range of an enemy operative.

operatives.name: DEATH KORPS SNIPER
operatives.keywords: Imperium, Astra Militarum, Sniper, Requisitioned Operatives, Inquisitorial Agent, Death Korps

operatives.name: DEATH KORPS SAPPER
operatives.description: Whether blowing up ammo dumps or cracking open defences, many kill teams need explosives experts. Death Korps Sappers are such troops. Naturally daring, they often have to put themselves in harm’s way to plant their remote mines at the optimum point to blow their target into smithereens.
operatives.keywords: Imperium, Astra Militarum, Sapper, Requisitioned Operatives, Inquisitorial Agent, Death Korps

weapons.name: REMOTE DETONATOR
weapons.rules: Heavy (Dash only), Limited 1, Piercing 1, Silent, Detonate*

abilities.name: Mine Layer
abilities.rules: This operative is carrying your Mine marker. It can perform the Pick Up Marker action on that marker, and whenever it performs the Place Marker action on that marker, it can immediately perform a free Dash action.

operatives.name: DEATH KORPS TROOPER
operatives.description: These Troopers have a great deal of combat experience, gained over harsh fighting for months or even years. Armed with lasguns and bayonets, they have faced down terrible danger time and time again.
operatives.keywords: Imperium, Astra Militarum, Trooper, Death Korps, Inquisitorial Agent, Requisitioned Operatives

abilities.name: Group Activation
abilities.rules: Whenever this operative is expended, you must then activate one other ready friendly INQUISITORIAL AGENT TROOPER operative (if able) before your opponent activates. When that other operative is expended, your opponent then activates as normal (in other words, you cannot activate more than two operatives in succession with this rule).

operatives.name: DEATH KORPS VETERAN
operatives.description: Death Korps Veterans are resilient above and beyond even their peers. These troops are steel in body as well as in mind, with bionics in the place of body parts lost in battle. Despite the horrific wounds they have suffered, they fight on still, unbowed.
operatives.keywords: Imperium, Astra Militarum, Veteran, Requisitioned Operatives, Death Korps, Inquisitorial Agent

abilities.name: Veteran Guardsman
abilities.rules: Whenever this operative is activated, it can receive one GUARDSMAN ORDER.

abilities.name: Bionics
abilities.rules: Normal Dmg of 3 or more inflicts 1 less damage on this operative.

operatives.name: DEATH KORPS VOX-OPERATOR
operatives.description: Vox-operators are consummate professionals, accompanying their leaders wherever required whilst carrying heavy equipment, all to receive and transmit communications that are vital for their comrades and superiors to understand the inevitable confusion of battle.
operatives.keywords: Imperium, Astra Militarum, Vox-Operator, Requisitioned Operatives, Death Korps, Inquisitorial Agent

abilities.name: Relay Orders
abilities.rules: Once per turning point, when this operative receives a GUARDSMAN ORDER, if it’s not within control range of enemy operatives, it can relay that order. Whenever an order is relayed, all friendly INQUISITORIAL AGENT operatives in the killzone receive that order, then subtract 1 from this operative’s APL stat until the end of its next activation.

actions.name: Signal
effects: ▶ SUPPORT. Select one other friendly INQUISITORIAL AGENT operative visible to and within 6" of this operative. Until the end of that operative’s next activation, add 1 to its APL stat.
conditions: This operative cannot perform this action while within control range of an enemy operative.

operatives.name: DEATH KORPS ZEALOT
operatives.description: Death Korps Zealots are deeply spiritual warriors, often claiming their survival through the horrifying battlefields they’ve experienced is only thanks to the direct intervention of the Emperor himself.
operatives.keywords: Imperium, Astra Militarum, Zealot, Requisitioned Operatives, Death Korps, Inquisitorial Agent

abilities.name: The Emperor Protects
abilities.rules: Whenever an operative is shooting this operative, you can re-roll any of your defence dice.

strategy_ploys.name: SIEGE WARFARE
strategy_ploys.description: Death Korps infantry are at home in the dreadful grind of siege warfare, repelling their foes with overlapping fields of withering fire.
strategy_ploys.rules: Friendly Death Korps operatives’ ranged weapons have the Saturate and Accurate 1 weapon rules.

strategy_ploys.name: TAKE COVER
strategy_ploys.description: Used to fighting in the close confines of trenches and tunnels, Krieg soldiers make excellent use of whatever meagre cover they can find.
strategy_ploys.rules: Whenever an operative is shooting a friendly Death Korps operative, if you can retain any cover saves, improve that friendly operative’s Save stat by 1.

strategy_ploys.name: CLEAR THE LINE
strategy_ploys.description: Should the enemy break through, the soldiers of Krieg are disciplined enough to retain their composure and repel the foe.
strategy_ploys.rules: Friendly Death Korps operatives’ melee weapons have the Accurate 1 weapon rule. Whenever a friendly Death Korps operative is fighting wholly within your territory, or whenever it’s retaliating, its melee weapons also have the Severe weapon rule.

strategy_ploys.name: REGROUP
strategy_ploys.description: Even in the confusion of combat, the Death Korps of Krieg retain their focus, returning to formation as they destroy the enemy with accurate las fire.
strategy_ploys.rules: SUPPORT. Select one friendly Death Korps operative that’s more than 3" from enemy operatives. Each other friendly Death Korps operative within 5" of that operative and not within control range of enemy operatives can immediately perform a free Dash action in an order of your choice, but each that does so must end that move closer to that operative. Note that a Comms114]

strategy_ploys.name: IN LIFE, SHAME
strategy_ploys.description: The Cult of Krieg demand sacrifice in the name of the Emperor, so those who are yet to give their lives must atone by achieving ever greater feats upon the battlefield.
strategy_ploys.rules: Use this firefight ploy when a friendly Death Korps operative is activated and given an Engage order. It receives every GUARDSMAN ORDER. This takes precedence over the normal rule that operatives cannot benefit from more than one GUARDSMAN ORDER at once.

strategy_ploys.name: IN DEATH, ATONEMENT
strategy_ploys.description: All soldiers of Krieg are destined to die in battle. The Cult of Sacrifice teaches that in death they will earn forgiveness for the sins of their forebears.
strategy_ploys.rules: Use this firefight ploy when a friendly Death Korps operative is incapacitated, before it’s removed from the killzone.

equipment.name: COMM-BEADS
equipment.description: Vox-casters and receivers allow Death Korps soldiers to remain in contact even as they are separated in the confusion of battle.
equipment.rules: Whenever a friendly Death Korps WATCHMASTER or friendly Death Korps CONFIDANT operative issues a GUARDSMAN ORDER, you can use this rule. If you do, instead of each friendly Death Korps operative within 6" of it receiving that order, you can select one friendly Death Korps operative to receive that order.

equipment.name: HAND AXE
equipment.rules: Friendly Death Korps operatives have the following melee weapon: NAME ATK HIT DMG Hand axe 3 4+ 3/4

rules.name: GUARDSMEN ORDERS
rules.description: The soldiers of the Death Korps of Krieg are unquestioningly loyal to their officers, following barked orders with a speed and efficiency that is the envy of many other regiments.
rules.rules: STRATEGIC GAMBIT and SUPPORT. A friendly Death Korps WATCHMASTER operative can issue a GUARDSMAN ORDER. Whenever it does, select one GUARDSMAN ORDER for all friendly Death Korps operatives within 6" of it to receive. Whenever a friendly operative receives a GUARDSMAN ORDER, apply its rules until the end of the turning point. Operatives cannot benefit from more than one GUARDSMAN ORDER at once; they only benefit from the most recent order they received during the turning point. GUARDSMEN ORDERS OPTIONS ARE PRESENTED ON THEIR OWN CARD Take Aim! R Move stats cannot be worsened.

selection.operatives: ↘ Every ELUCIDIAN STARSTRIDER operative in the following list: • 1 ELUCIA VHANE • 1 CANID • 1 DEATH CULT EXECUTIONER • 1 LECTRO-MAESTER • 1 REJUVENAT ADEPT • 1 VOIDMASTER • 3 VOIDSMAN with lasgun and gun butt • 1 VOIDSMAN with rotor cannon and gun butt
selection.notes: The full datacards for ELUCIA VHANE, LECTRO-MAESTER, VOIDMASTER, and VOIDSMAN, including their detailed weapon statistics, keywords, and complete abilities/actions, are not provided in the source snippets for extraction. Only their names and general selection options are mentioned.

operatives.name: ELUCIA VAYNE
operatives.keywords: ELUCIDIAN STARSTRIDER, IMPERIUM, LEADER, Elucia Vayne

abilities.name: Disruption Field
abilities.rules: Whenever an operative is shooting this operative, ignore the **Piercing** weapon rule.

abilities.name: Digital Lasers
abilities.rules: Whenever this operative performs the **Fight** action, at the start of the Roll Attack Dice step, you can use this rule. If you do, inflict 1 damage on the enemy operative in that sequence.

abilities.name: Merciless
abilities.rules: Whenever this operative is shooting against, fighting against or retaliating against an enemy operative that was already wounded when the action started, this operative's weapons have the **Balanced** weapon rule; if the weapon already has that weapon rule, it has the **Ceaseless** weapon rule instead of **Balanced**.

abilities.name: Reputation to Maintain
abilities.rules: The first time this operative incapacitates an enemy operative during the battle, you can either gain 1 additional CP or use an additional **WARRANT OF TRADE** rule (up to four uses per battle, instead of three). Note that you still cannot use the same **WARRANT OF TRADE** rule more than once per battle.

operatives.name: CANID
operatives.description: Countless strains of Canid are bred or vat-grown to fulfil hunting, attack or intimidation roles, and many Rogue Traders appreciate the combination of loyalty and aggression. Elucia Vhane named her beast Aximillion, and her Voidsmen-at-Arms train it as guardian and companion.
keywords: ELUCIDIAN STARSTRIDER

abilities.name: Beast
abilities.rules: This operative cannot perform any actions other than **Charge**, **Dash**, **Fall Back**, **Fight**, **Gather**, **Guard**, **Reposition**, **Pick Up Marker** and **Place Marker**. It cannot use any weapons that aren’t on its datacard.

abilities.name: Loyal Companion
abilities.rules: Whenever an enemy operative performs the **Fight** action, if this operative is a valid operative to fight against, you can force them to select this operative to fight against instead. Whenever an enemy operative ends the **Charge** action within control range of another friendly ELUCIDIAN STARSTRIDER operative within 3" of this operative, if this operative isn’t within control range of enemy operatives, this operative can immediately perform a free **Charge** action, but must end that move within control range of that enemy operative.

actions.name: GATHER
effects: ↘ Perform a free **Dash** or **Reposition** action with this operative. During that move, you can perform a free **Pick Up Marker** or **Place Marker** action with this operative (you can determine control during that action to do so), and any remaining move distance it had from the **Dash** or **Reposition** action can be used after it does so.

operatives.name: DEATH CULT EXECUTIONER
operatives.description: For a Death Cult Executioner, the act of living is a blasphemy only balanced by the tally of souls they reap. They deliver death up close and master numerous combat styles. A follower of Vhane, the Death Cult Executioner Knosso Prond has vowed to kill a thousand different xenos.
keywords: ELUCIDIAN STARSTRIDER

abilities.name: Rapid Reflexes
abilities.rules: Whenever an operative is shooting this operative, ignore the **Piercing** weapon rule.

abilities.name: Bladed Stance
abilities.rules: Whenever this operative is fighting or retaliating, you can resolve one of your successes before the normal order. If you do, that success must be used to block.

abilities.name: Zealot
abilities.rules: If this operative is incapacitated during the **Fight** action, you can strike the enemy operative in that sequence with one of your unresolved successes before this operative is removed from the killzone.

actions.name: TRAINED ASSASSIN
conditions: This operative cannot perform this action while within control range of an enemy operative.

operatives.name: LECTRO-MAESTER
operatives.keywords: ELUCIDIAN STARSTRIDER, IMPERIUM, Lectro-maester

abilities.name: Missionary of the Martian Creed
abilities.rules: Once during each of this operative’s activations, it can perform the **Pick Up Marker**, **Place Marker** or a mission action for 1 less AP.

abilities.name: Voltaghiest Array
abilities.rules: Whenever an operative is shooting a friendly ELUCIDIAN STARSTRIDER operative that’s within 4" of this operative, you can re-roll one of your defence dice.

actions.name: Calibrate Voltagheist
effects: ↘ Select one of the following effects to last until the start of this operative’s next activation, until it’s incapacitated or until it performs this action again (whichever comes first): • Charge: This operative’s voltaic pistol has the **Lethal 4+** weapon rule. • Field: Whenever an enemy operative ends the **Charge**, **Dash**, **Fall Back** or **Reposition** action visible to and within 4" of this operative, inflict D6 damage on that enemy operative.
conditions: This operative cannot perform this action while within control range of an enemy operative.

operatives.name: REJUVENAT ADEPT
keywords: ELUCIDIAN STARSTRIDER

abilities.name: Disciplinarian
abilities.rules: SUPPORT. Whenever another friendly NAVIS operative is within 3" of this operative, that friendly operative’s ranged weapons (excluding PRIVATEER SUPPORT ASSET weapons) have the **Balanced** weapon rule; if the weapon already has that weapon rule, it has the **Ceaseless** weapon rule instead of **Balanced**.

abilities.name: Medic!
abilities.rules: The first time during each turning point that another friendly ELUCIDIAN STARSTRIDER operative would be incapacitated while visible to and within 3" of this operative, you can use this rule, providing neither this nor that operative is within control range of an enemy operative. If you do, that friendly operative isn’t incapacitated, has 3 wounds remaining and cannot be incapacitated for the remainder of the action. After that action, that friendly operative can then immediately perform a free **Dash** action, but must end that move within this operative’s control range. If this rule was used during that friendly operative’s activation, that activation ends. You cannot use this rule if this operative is incapacitated, or if it’s a **Shoot** action and this operative would be a primary or secondary target.

operatives.name: VOIDMASTER
operatives.keywords: ELUCIDIAN STARSTRIDER, IMPERIUM, Voidmaster, NAVIS

abilities.name: Disciplinarian
abilities.rules: SUPPORT. Whenever another friendly NAVIS operative is within 3" of this operative, that friendly operative’s ranged weapons (excluding PRIVATEER SUPPORT ASSET weapons) have the **Balanced** weapon rule; if the weapon already has that weapon rule, it has the **Ceaseless** weapon rule instead of **Balanced**.

abilities.name: Hardy
abilities.rules: Once per battle, when an attack dice inflicts Normal Dmg on this operative, you can ignore that inflicted damage.

actions.name: Uncompromising Fire
effects: ↘ Perform two free **Shoot** actions with this operative (this takes precedence over action restrictions). You must select its relic laspistol for one action and its artificer shotgun (close range) for the other (in any order).
conditions: This operative cannot perform this action while it has a Conceal order, or during an activation in which it performed the **Shoot** action (or vice versa).

operatives.name: VOIDSMAN WITH LASGUN
operatives.keywords: ELUCIDIAN STARSTRIDER, IMPERIUM, NAVIS, Voidsman

operatives.name: VOIDSMAN WITH ROTOR CANNON
operatives.keywords: ELUCIDIAN STARSTRIDER, IMPERIUM, NAVIS, Voidsman

equipment.name: ARMOURED UNDERSUIT
equipment.rules: Whenever an operative is shooting a friendly ELUCIDIAN STARSTRIDER operative that has a 5+ Save stat (excluding CANID), you can retain one of your defence dice results of 4 as a normal success.

equipment.name: HOT SHOT CAPACITOR PACKS
equipment.rules: Up to twice per turning point, whenever a friendly ELUCIDIAN STARSTRIDER operative is performing the **Shoot** action and you select a laspistol or lasgun, you can use this rule. If you do, until the end of the turning point, add 1 to both Dmg stats of that weapon and it has the **Hot** and **Piercing Crits 1** weapon rules. Note that relic laspistols are excluded from this rule.

equipment.name: IMPROVED COORDINATES UPLINK
equipment.rules: Whenever a friendly ELUCIDIAN STARSTRIDER operative is using a PRIVATEER SUPPORT ASSET, if the target is within 6" of a friendly ELUCIDIAN STARSTRIDER NAVIS operative, the target cannot be obscured and that weapon has the **Saturate** weapon rule.

rules.name: ADAPTABLE TERMS
rules.description:
When: At the end of the second turning point.
Effect: Select a new tac op or a new primary op. If you select a new tac op, any points scored from the previous tac op are discarded.
rules.rules:
When: At the end of the second turning point.
Effect: Select a new tac op or a new primary op. If you select a new tac op, any points scored from the previous tac op are discarded.

selection.operatives: ↘ 1 EXACTION SQUAD PROCTOR-EXACTANT operative with one of the following options: ○ Combat shotgun; repression baton ○ Shotpistol; dominator maul & assault shield ↘ 10 EXACTION SQUAD operatives selected from the following list: • CASTIGATOR • CHIRURGANT • LEASHMASTER • R-VR CYBER-MASTIFF • MALOCATOR • MARKSMAN • REVELATUM • SUBDUCTOR • VIGILANT • VOX-SIGNIFIER • GUNNER with one of the following options: ○ Grenade launcher; repression baton ○ Heavy stubber; repression baton ○ Webber; repression baton Other than GUNNER, SUBDUCTOR and VIGILANT operatives, your kill team can only include each operative on this list once. Your kill team can only include up to two GUNNER operatives (each must have a different option) and up to four SUBDUCTOR operatives.

operatives.name: ARBITES PROCTOR-EXACTANT
operatives.keywords: EXACTION SQUAD, IMPERIUM, LEADER, Proctor-Exactant, ADEPTUS ARBITES

abilities.name: Nuncio-aquila
abilities.rules: • Whenever an enemy operative is within 3" of your Nuncio-aquila marker (or this operative if your Nuncio-aquila marker isn’t in the killzone), your opponent must spend 1 additional AP for that enemy operative to perform the **Pick Up Marker** and mission actions. • Whenever determining control of a marker, treat the total APL stat of enemy operatives that contest it as 1 lower if at least one of those enemy operatives is within 3" of your Nuncio-aquila marker (or this operative if your Nuncio-aquila marker isn’t in the killzone). Note this isn’t a change to the APL stat, so any changes are cumulative with this.

actions.name: Deploy Nuncio-aquila
effects: ↘ If your Nuncio-aquila marker isn’t in the killzone, place it within 6" horizontally of this operative; otherwise, move your Nuncio-aquila marker up to 6" horizontally. If this operative is removed from the killzone, remove your Nuncio-aquila marker from the killzone.
conditions: This operative cannot perform this action while within control range of an enemy operative.

operatives.name: ARBITES CHIRURGANT
keywords: EXACTION SQUAD

abilities.name: Engendered Focus
abilities.rules: You can ignore any changes to this operative’s stats (including its weapons’ stats, but excluding its Save stat).

abilities.name: Medic!
abilities.rules: The first time during each turning point that another friendly EXACTION SQUAD operative would be incapacitated while visible to and within 3” of this operative, you can use this rule, providing neither this nor that operative is within control range of an enemy operative. If you do, that friendly operative isn’t incapacitated, has 1 wound remaining and cannot be incapacitated for the remainder of the action. After that action, that friendly operative can then immediately perform a free **Dash** action, but must end that move within this operative’s control range. Subtract 1 from this and that operative’s APL stats until the end of their next activations respectively, and if this rule was used during that friendly operative’s activation, that activation ends. You cannot use this rule if this operative is incapacitated, or if it’s a **Shoot** action and this operative would be a primary or secondary target.

actions.name: R-VR COMMAND
actions.rules: Select one friendly EXACTION SQUAD R-VR CYBER-MASTIFF operative and change its attack pattern.

operatives.name: ARBITES LEASHMASTER
keywords: EXACTION SQUAD

abilities.name: Handler
abilities.rules: Whenever this operative is activated, you can activate a ready friendly EXACTION SQUAD R-VR CYBER-MASTIFF operative at the same time. Complete their activations action by action in any order.

abilities.name: Attack Pattern
abilities.rules: **STRATEGIC GAMBIT**. Select one of the following attack patterns for a friendly EXACTION SQUAD R-VR CYBER-MASTIFF operative to have for the battle: • Aggressive: Its melee weapons have the **Relentless** weapon rule. • Swift: Add 2" to its Move stat. • Defensive: Improve its Save stat by 1.

operatives.name: R-VR CYBER-MASTIFF
operatives.description: Arbitrators employ many servo-constructs for intimidation, security and pursuit. The Rantal-class Venatus Reclamator is an advanced Cyber-mastiff used by Exaction Squads. The R-VR’s detectors enable them to track their prey, while their iron jaws can break bones or kill on command.
keywords: EXACTION SQUAD

abilities.name: Beast
abilities.rules: This operative cannot perform any actions other than **Apprehend**, **Charge**, **Dash**, **Fall Back**, **Fight**, **Guard**, **Reposition**, **Pick Up Marker** and **Place Marker**. It cannot use any weapons that aren’t on its datacard.

actions.name: APPREHEND
effects: ↘ Select one enemy operative within this operative’s control range. Until that enemy operative is no longer within this operative’s control range, or until this operative performs this action again (whichever comes first), worsen the Hit stat of that enemy operative’s weapons by 1 (this isn’t cumulative with being injured); in addition, that enemy operative cannot perform the **Fall Back** action.
conditions: This operative cannot perform this action unless an enemy operative is within its control range.

operatives.name: ARBITES VOX-SIGNIFIER
operatives.description: The team’s Vox-signifier listens for coded missives from mission command on their powerful precinct vox-relay. They issue updates to the rest of the Exaction Squad arising from changes to mission priorities and new intelligence – likely painfully extracted from prisoners.
keywords: EXACTION SQUAD

abilities.name: Acute Focus
abilities.rules: Once during each of this operative’s activations, it can perform the **Pick Up Marker**, **Place Marker**, **Veriscant** or a mission action for 1 less AP.

strategy_ploys.name: GUILT REVEALS ITSELF
strategy_ploys.description: EXACTION SQUAD are **Relentless** in their pursuit of the condemned. Few escape their clutches.
strategy_ploys.rules: Whenever you’re selecting a valid target for a friendly EXACTION SQUAD operative, enemy operatives within 4" of it cannot be in cover (instead of 2"). While this can allow such operatives to be targeted (assuming they’re visible), it doesn’t remove their cover save (if any), unless the friendly EXACTION SQUAD operative is within 2" as normal.

strategy_ploys.name: INVIOLATE JURISDICTION
strategy_ploys.description: **Emboldened** by the authority they hold, EXACTION SQUAD will fight with zealous determination to hold key positions against the foe.
strategy_ploys.rules: Whenever an operative is shooting a friendly EXACTION SQUAD operative that’s within 2" of an objective marker or an enemy operative, you can re-roll one of your defence dice.

strategy_ploys.name: DISPENSE JUSTICE
strategy_ploys.description: In pursuit of the guilty, Arbitrators are focused, disciplined and utterly determined.
strategy_ploys.rules: Whenever a friendly EXACTION SQUAD operative is fighting or retaliating, if it hasn’t moved more than its Move stat during the activation, or if it's a counteraction, its melee weapons have the **Ceaseless** weapon rule.

strategy_ploys.name: TERMINAL DECREE
strategy_ploys.description: A dangerous quarry has been judged guilty of heinous crimes against the Imperium and must be terminated with extreme prejudice.
strategy_ploys.rules: **STRATEGIC GAMBIT**. Select one enemy operative to be your mark for the turning point. Whenever a friendly EXACTION SQUAD operative is shooting against, fighting against or retaliating against your mark, that friendly operative’s weapons have the **Punishing** weapon rule. Whenever your mark is incapacitated, you can select a new enemy operative to be your mark for the turning point (and can continue to do so during this turning point).

rules.name: RUTHLESS EFFICIENCY
rules.description: A target, whether marked to be apprehended or eliminated, stands little chance of escaping the attention of an Adeptus Arbites EXACTION SQUAD.
rules.rules: Whenever a friendly EXACTION SQUAD operative is shooting (excluding with frag or krak grenades) and you’re selecting a valid target, you can use this rule. If you do, having other friendly EXACTION SQUAD operatives within an enemy operative’s control range doesn’t prevent that enemy operative from being selected.

rules.name: REPRESS
rules.description: Experienced in suppressing riots, rebellions and various other kinds of unrest, the Adeptus Arbites are resilient in the face of any oncoming foe, no matter their origin.
rules.rules: Whenever this operative is using this weapon: • Each of your blocks can be allocated to block two unresolved successes (instead of one). • If this operative is retaliating, you resolve the first attack dice (i.e. defender instead of attacker).

name: FARSTALKER KINBAND
description: Farstalker Kinbands operate as scouts for the Kroot species. They range far and wide throughout the galaxy, seeking new and valuable genetic material to return to their Shapers. Farstalker Kinband kill teams contain expert trackers, hunters and guerrilla fighters who are capable of matching far more technologically advanced foes.

selection.operatives: ↘ 1 FARSTALKER KINBAND KILL-BROKER operative with one of the following options: ○ Kroot rifle; ritual blade ○ Pulse weapon; ritual blade ↘ 11 FARSTALKER KINBAND operatives selected from the following list: ○ BOW-HUNTER ○ COLD-BLOOD ○ CUT-SKIN ○ HOUND ○ LONG-SIGHT ○ PISTOLIER ○ STALKER ○ TRACKER ○ HEAVY GUNNER with one of the following options: ○ Dvorgite skinner; blade ○ Londaxi tribalest; blade ○ WARRIOR with one of the following options: ○ Kroot rifle; blade ○ Kroot scattergun; blade Other than HOUND and WARRIOR operatives, your kill team can only include each operative on this list once. Your kill team can only include up to two HOUND operatives.

operatives.name: KROOT KILL-BROKER
operatives.description: Kill-brokers are both expert tacticians and skilled fighters, and are able to negotiate. They lead their bands of Yaegirs with an iron-clad conviction in the service their mission will offer to the Votann. They lead their bands of Yaegirs with an iron-clad conviction in the service their mission will offer to the Votann.
operatives.keywords: FARSTALKER KINBAND, T'au Empire, Leader, Kroot, Kill-Broker

abilities.name: Hardy
abilities.rules: Whenever an attack dice would inflict **Critical Dmg** on this operative, you can choose for that attack dice to inflict **Normal Dmg** instead.

abilities.name: Victory Shriek
abilities.rules: Whenever your mark is incapacitated, you can select one friendly FARSTALKER KINBAND operative within 6" of this operative. Until the end of the battle, that operative’s weapons have the Balanced weapon rule. Each friendly operative can only be selected for this rule once per battle.

operatives.name: KROOT BOW-HUNTER
operatives.description: The accelerator bows wielded by these Kroot are distinctive weapons, with a Kroot rifle at their core. When fired, the bow’s curves crackle with energy, charging the loaded arrow’s head. Effects on struck enemies vary depending on the material the arrowhead is made from. These specialists provide close-range support when facing swarms of lesser foes or heavily armoured targets.
operatives.keywords: FARSTALKER KINBAND, Operative, Kroot, T'au Empire, Bow-Hunter

abilities.name: ENERGISE
abilities.rules: Until the end of the turning point or until this operative has shot with its accelerator bow (whichever comes first), all profiles of its accelerator bow have the **Lethal** 5+ weapon rule.

operatives.name: KROOT COLD-BLOOD
operatives.description: Not explicitly stated in source, general description of Farstalker Kinband applies.
operatives.keywords: Operative, T'au Empire, Kroot, Cold-Blood, FARSTALKER KINBAND

abilities.name: Hardy
abilities.rules: Whenever an attack dice would inflict **Critical Dmg** on this operative, you can choose for that attack dice to inflict **Normal Dmg** instead.

abilities.name: Cold-blooded
abilities.rules: Whenever this operative is shooting against, fighting against or retaliating against a wounded enemy operative, this operative’s weapons have the **Lethal** 5+ weapon rule; if that enemy operative is also injured, this operative’s weapons also have the **Rending** weapon rule.

operatives.name: KROOT CUT-SKIN
operatives.description: Not explicitly stated in source, general description of Farstalker Kinband applies.
operatives.keywords: FARSTALKER KINBAND, Operative, Kroot, T'au Empire, Cut-Skin

abilities.name: Vicious Duellist
abilities.rules: Whenever this operative is fighting or retaliating, for each attack dice your opponent discards as a fail, inflict 1 damage on the enemy operative in that sequence.

abilities.name: Savage Assault
abilities.rules: The first time this operative performs the **Fight** action during each of its activations, if neither it nor the enemy operative in that sequence is incapacitated, this operative can immediately perform a free **Fight** action afterwards, but it can only fight against that enemy operative (and only if it’s still valid to fight against). This takes precedence over action restrictions.

operatives.name: KROOT HEAVY GUNNER
operatives.description: Not explicitly stated in source, general description of Farstalker Kinband applies.
operatives.keywords: FARSTALKER KINBAND, Operative, T'au Empire, Kroot, Heavy Gunner

operatives.name: KROOT HOUND
operatives.description: Not explicitly stated in source, general description of Mutoid Vermin applies.
operatives.keywords: FARSTALKER KINBAND, T'au Empire, Kroot, Hound, Operative

abilities.name: Beast
abilities.rules: This operative cannot perform any actions other than **Charge**, **Dash**, **Fall Back**, **Fight**, **Gather**, **Guard**, **Reposition**, **Pick Up Marker** and **Place Marker**. It cannot use any weapons that aren’t on its datacard.

abilities.name: Bad-tempered
abilities.rules: Whenever an enemy operative performs the **Fight** action, if this operative is a valid operative to fight against, you can force them to select this operative to fight against instead. Whenever an enemy operative ends the **Charge** action within control range of another friendly FARSTALKER KINBAND operative within 3" of this operative, if this operative isn’t within control range of enemy operatives, this operative can immediately perform a free **Charge** action, but must end that move within control range of that enemy operative.

actions.name: Gather
effects: • Perform a free **Dash** or **Reposition** action with this operative. During that move, you can perform a free **Pick Up Marker** or **Place Marker** action with this operative (you can determine control during that action to do so), and any remaining move distance it had from the **Dash** or **Reposition** action can be used after it does so.

operatives.name: KROOT LONG-SIGHT
operatives.description: Not explicitly stated in source, general description of Farstalker Kinband applies.
operatives.keywords: Operative, FARSTALKER KINBAND, Kroot, T'au Empire, Long-Sight

operatives.name: KROOT PISTOLIER
operatives.description: Not explicitly stated in source, general description of Farstalker Kinband applies.
operatives.keywords: FARSTALKER KINBAND, Operative, T'au Empire, Kroot, Pistolier

abilities.name: Quick Draw
abilities.rules: Once per turning point, when an enemy operative is performing the **Shoot** action and this operative is selected as the valid target (or if it will be a secondary target from the **Blast** weapon rule), if this operative is ready, you can interrupt that action to use this rule. If you do, this operative can immediately perform a free **Shoot** action with its dual Kroot pistols (focused) against that enemy operative (you can change its order to Engage to do so), but that enemy operative must be a valid target.

operatives.name: KROOT STALKER
operatives.description: Not explicitly stated in source, general description of Farstalker Kinband applies.
operatives.keywords: FARSTALKER KINBAND, Operative, T'au Empire, Kroot, Stalker

abilities.name: Stalker
abilities.rules: This operative can perform the **Charge** action while it has a Conceal order.

actions.name: Kroot Stalker
effects: • Perform a free **Charge** action with this operative, but don’t exceed its Move stat (i.e. don’t add 2"). Then immediately perform a free Fight action with this operative. The first time you strike during that action, you can immediately resolve another of your successes as a strike (before your opponent).
conditions: This operative cannot perform this action while it has an Engage order, while within control range of an enemy operative, or if it isn’t within 1" of Light or Heavy terrain.

operatives.name: KROOT TRACKER
operatives.description: Not explicitly stated in source, general description of Farstalker Kinband applies.
operatives.keywords: Operative, FARSTALKER KINBAND, T'au Empire, Kroot, Tracker

abilities.name: Pan Spectral Visor
abilities.rules: Whenever this operative is shooting an operative within 6" of it: • This operative’s weapons have the **Seek Light** weapon rule. • That operative cannot be obscured.

abilities.name: Tracker
abilities.rules: Whenever this operative is shooting against or fighting against an expended operative within 6" of it, this operative’s weapons have the **Punishing** weapon rule.

actions.name: From the Eye Above
effects: • **SUPPORT**. Select one other friendly FARSTALKER KINBAND operative visible to and within 6" of this operative. Until the end of that operative’s next activation, add 1 to its APL stat.
conditions: This operative cannot perform this action while within control range of an enemy operative.

actions.name: MARKED FOR THE HUNT
actions.rules: Remove your Pech’ra marker from the killzone (if any). Then place your Pech’ra marker visible to this operative, or on Vantage terrain of a terrain feature that’s visible to this operative. Whenever a friendly FARSTALKER KINBAND operative is shooting an enemy operative that has that marker within its control range, that friendly operative’s ranged weapons have the **Seek Light** weapon rule. At the start of this operative’s next activation or if it’s removed from the killzone (whichever comes first), remove your Pech’ra marker from the killzone.
conditions: This operative cannot perform this action while within control range of an enemy operative.

operatives.name: KROOT WARRIOR
operatives.description: Not explicitly stated in source, general description of Farstalker Kinband applies.
operatives.keywords: Operative, FARSTALKER KINBAND, T'au Empire, Kroot, Warrior

abilities.name: Ready for Anything
abilities.rules: Once per turning point, during a friendly **WARRIOR** operative’s activation, you can use the Meat, Piercing Shot or Toxin Shot rule (see faction equipment) for that operative. Doing so doesn’t count for its once per turning point limit.

strategy_ploys.name: BOUND
strategy_ploys.description: The long, muscular legs of the Kroot allow them to cover great distances in a single, bounding leap.
strategy_ploys.rules: During each friendly FARSTALKER KINBAND operative’s activation, you can ignore the first vertical distance of 2" they move during one climb up.

strategy_ploys.name: CUT-THROATS
strategy_ploys.description: Kroot warriors are lethal melee combatants. Their bladed weapons are capable of tearing through exposed flesh with ease.
strategy_ploys.rules: Add 1 to the Atk stat of friendly FARSTALKER KINBAND operatives’ melee weapons (to a maximum of 5).

equipment.name: TOXIN SHOT
equipment.description: Kroot toxin bullets contain reservoirs of venom extracted from various alien fauna, all of which is incredibly lethal.
equipment.rules: Once per turning point, when a friendly FARSTALKER KINBAND operative is performing the **Shoot** action and you select a Kroot rifle, Kroot scattergun or dual Kroot pistols (focused), you can use this rule. If you do, until the end of that action, that weapon has the **Lethal** 5+ and **Stun** weapon rules. You cannot use the Piercing Shot and Toxin Shot rule during the same action.

rules.name: FARSTALKER
rules.description: Farstalker Kinband Kindbands move and fight instinctively, reacting to developing battlefield conditions with an inhuman speed of thought.
rules.rules: In the Ready step of each Strategy phase, you can change the order of up to three friendly FARSTALKER KINBAND operatives that are not within control range of enemy operatives. Whenever it’s your turn to counteract, you can change the order of one friendly FARSTALKER KINBAND operative that’s not within control range of enemy operatives instead. This still counts as you counteracting (so activation alternates back to your opponent afterwards), but doesn’t count as that friendly operative’s counteraction for this turning point.

name: FELLGOR RAVAGERS
description: Of all the mutant Beastmen in thrall to the Dark Gods, Fellgor Ravagers believe themselves the greatest and most powerful. They stalk space hulks, underhives and warp-tainted ruins, using their keen senses to track unsuspecting prey through the darkness before striking and butchering their foes with savage glee. Goremonger kill teams are territorial and aggressive, yet to view them as crazed butchers would be an oversimplification. They strive to emulate the bladework and military discipline of a Bloodletter pack, and are capable of identifying and destroying strategic assets in order to achieve victory in Khorne’s name.

selection.operatives: ↘ 1 FELLGOR RAVAGER IRONHORN operative with one of the following options: ○ Corrupted pistol; corrupted chainsword ○ Plasma pistol; bludgeon ↘ 9 FELLGOR RAVAGER operatives selected from the following list: ○ DEATHKNELL ○ FLUXBRAY ○ GNARLSCAR ○ GOREHORN ○ HERD-GOAD ○ MANGLER ○ SHAMAN ○ TOXHORN ○ VANDAL ○ WARRIOR with one of the following options: ○ Autopistol; bludgeon ○ Autopistol; cleaver Other than WARRIOR operatives, your kill team can only include each operative on this list once.

operatives.name: IRONHORN
operatives.description: The leaders of the Fellgor Ravagers are vicious killers who have fought their way to the top of their pack, possessing an inhuman cunning that they use to merciless effect.
operatives.keywords: FELLGOR RAVAGER, Chaos, Leader, Ironhorn

abilities.name: Call the Attack
abilities.rules: **STRATEGIC GAMBIT**. Select one friendly FELLGOR RAVAGER operative visible to and within 6" of this operative. That selected operative, and each other friendly FELLGOR RAVAGER operative visible to and within 2" of it, can immediately perform a free **Dash** action in an order of your choice.

abilities.name: Impending Apotheosis
abilities.rules: Once per battle, when an attack dice inflicts damage on this operative, you can ignore that inflicted damage.

abilities.name: Khorne’s Favour
abilities.rules: Once during each of this operative’s activations, if its GORE TANK is empty, you can increase its GORE TANK.

operatives.name: GNARLSCAR
operatives.description: Not explicitly stated in source, general description of Fellgor Ravagers applies.
operatives.keywords: FELLGOR RAVAGER, Chaos, Operative, Gnarlscar

abilities.name: Sagacious
abilities.rules: At the end of this operative’s activation, you can change its order.

abilities.name: War Gong
abilities.rules: Whenever an attack dice would inflict **Critical Dmg** on a friendly FELLGOR RAVAGER operative within 3" of this operative, if this operative doesn’t have one of your Frenzy tokens, you can choose for that attack dice to inflict **Normal Dmg** instead.

actions.name: Uncompromising Attack
effects: • Perform a free **Fight** action with this operative, then perform a free **Shoot** action with this operative (or vice versa). This operative can perform that Shoot action while within control range of an enemy operative, but if it does, it can and must target an enemy operative within its control range (even if other friendly operatives are within that enemy operative’s control range). You can only select an autopistol for that **Shoot** action.

operatives.name: FLUXBRAY
operatives.description: Not explicitly stated in source, general description of Fellgor Ravagers applies.
operatives.keywords: FELLGOR RAVAGER, Chaos, Operative, Fluxbray

abilities.name: Blade Whirl
abilities.rules: Whenever this operative is fighting or retaliating, if it doesn’t have one of your Frenzy tokens, you can resolve one of your successes before the normal order. If you do, that success must be used to block.

actions.name: Cleaver Flurry
effects: • Perform a free **Reposition** action with this operative. During that action, it can move an additional 2", and can move within control range of enemy operatives (it cannot begin or end the move there). Inflict D3+1 damage on each enemy operative it moved within control range of (roll separately for each after it’s moved, in the order it moved within control range of them).
conditions: This operative cannot perform this action while it has a Conceal order.

operatives.name: HERD-GOAD
operatives.description: Not explicitly stated in source, general description of Fellgor Ravagers applies.
operatives.keywords: FELLGOR RAVAGER, Chaos, Operative, Herd-goad

abilities.name: Whip Control
abilities.rules: Whenever an enemy operative is visible to and within 3" of this operative, if this operative isn’t within control range of any other enemy operatives: • Subtract 1 from the Atk stat of that enemy operative’s melee weapons (to a minimum of 1). • Your opponent must spend 1 additional AP for that enemy operative to perform the **Fall Back** action.

actions.name: Incite Fury
effects: • **SUPPORT**. Select one other friendly FELLGOR RAVAGER operative (excluding SHAMAN and IRONHORN) visible to and within 3" of this operative. Until the end of that operative’s next activation, add 1 to its APL stat.
conditions: This operative cannot perform this action while within control range of an enemy operative.

operatives.name: WARRIOR WITH BLUDGEON
operatives.description: Not explicitly stated in source, general description of Fellgor Ravagers applies.
operatives.keywords: FELLGOR RAVAGER, Chaos, Deathknell, Operative

abilities.name: Warrior Frenzy
abilities.rules: Whenever this operative has one of your Frenzy tokens, it cannot be injured. This takes precedence over the normal Frenzy rules.

operatives.name: GOREHORN
operatives.description: Not explicitly stated in source, general description of Fellgor Ravagers applies.
operatives.keywords: FELLGOR RAVAGER, Chaos, Operative, Gorehorn

abilities.name: Champion
abilities.rules: This operative can perform two **Fight** actions during its activation.

abilities.name: •Headtaker
abilities.rules: Whenever this operative incapacitates an operative with this weapon, roll one D3: • This operative regains a number of lost wounds equal to the result (unless it has one of your Frenzy tokens). • Until the end of the battle, add the result to the Critical Dmg stat of this operative’s skullcleaver (to a maximum of 8).

operatives.name: MANGLER
operatives.description: Not explicitly stated in source, general description of Fellgor Ravagers applies.
operatives.keywords: FELLGOR RAVAGER, Chaos, Operative, Fluxbray

abilities.name: •Tactual Hunter
abilities.rules: Whenever this operative is fighting with this weapon against an expended operative, the first time you strike with a critical success during that sequence, you can immediately resolve another of your successes as a strike (before your opponent).

abilities.name: Berserker
abilities.rules: This operative cannot perform the **Shoot** action (other than **Guard**, but cannot then perform a free **Shoot** action during the interruption). You must spend 1 additional AP for this operative to perform the **Pick Up Marker** and mission actions (excluding **Operate Hatch**).

abilities.name: Savage
abilities.rules: The first time this operative performs the **Fight** action during each of its activations, if it isn’t incapacitated, it can immediately perform a free **Fight** action afterwards (you don’t have to select the same enemy operative to fight against). This takes precedence over action restrictions, and you cannot use the Ruthless Rampage firefight ploy between those two **Fight** actions.

abilities.name: Toxic Blessings
abilities.rules: You can ignore any changes to this operative’s APL stat and it’s not affected by enemy operatives’ Shock weapon rule. Whenever an attack dice inflicts **Normal Dmg** of 3 or more on this operative, roll one D6: on a 5+, subtract 1 from that inflicted damage.

abilities.name: Pox Bomb
abilities.rules: This operative can use stun grenades (see universal equipment). Doing so doesn’t count towards any **Limited** uses you have (i.e. if you also select that grenade from equipment for other operatives). Whenever an enemy operative takes a stun test as a result of this operative performing the **Stun** Grenade action, if the result is a 3+, also inflict damage on that enemy operative equal to the D6 result halved (rounding up).

operatives.name: SHAMAN
operatives.description: Not explicitly stated in source, general description of Fellgor Ravagers applies.
operatives.keywords: FELLGOR RAVAGER, Chaos, Psyker, Shaman, Operative

actions.name: Mantle of Darkness
effects: • PSYCHIC. Until the start of this operative’s next activation or until it’s incapacitated (whichever comes first), whenever a friendly FELLGOR RAVAGER operative is visible to and within 3" of this operative, has a Conceal order and is in cover, that friendly operative cannot be selected as a valid target, taking precedence over all other rules (e.g. **Seek**, Vantage terrain) except being within 2".
conditions: This operative cannot perform this action while it has a Conceal order.

actions.name: Apoplectic Rejuvenation
effects: • Select one friendly FELLGOR RAVAGER operative that doesn’t have one of your Frenzy tokens and is visible to and within 6" of this operative. That friendly operative regains 2D3 lost wounds; if that operative has incapacitated an enemy operative while fighting or retaliating during the battle, it regains 6 lost wounds instead.
conditions: This operative cannot perform this action while it has a Conceal order.

operatives.name: TOXHORN
operatives.description: Not explicitly stated in source, general description of Fellgor Ravagers applies.
operatives.keywords: FELLGOR RAVAGER, Chaos, Operative, Toxhorn

abilities.name: Toxic Blessings
abilities.rules: You can ignore any changes to this operative’s APL stat and it’s not affected by enemy operatives’ **Shock** weapon rule. Whenever an attack dice inflicts **Normal Dmg** of 3 or more on this operative, roll one D6: on a 5+, subtract 1 from that inflicted damage.

abilities.name: Pox Bomb
abilities.rules: This operative can use stun grenades (see universal equipment). Doing so doesn’t count towards any **Limited** uses you have (i.e. if you also select that grenade from equipment for other operatives). Whenever an enemy operative takes a stun test as a result of this operative performing the **Stun** Grenade action, if the result is a 3+, also inflict damage on that enemy operative equal to the D6 result halved (rounding up).

operatives.name: VANDAL
operatives.description: Not explicitly stated in source, general description of Fellgor Ravagers applies.
operatives.keywords: FELLGOR RAVAGER, Chaos, Operative, Vandal

abilities.name: •Vicious Blows
abilities.rules: Whenever this operative is fighting, this weapon has the Ceaseless weapon rule.

actions.name: Sweeping Blow
effects: • Inflict D3+1 damage on each other operative visible to and within 2" of this operative.
conditions: This operative cannot perform this action while it has a Conceal order.

operatives.name: DEATHKNELL
operatives.description: Not explicitly stated in source, general description of Fellgor Ravagers applies.
operatives.keywords: FELLGOR RAVAGER, Chaos, Deathknell, Operative

abilities.name: Icon Bearer
abilities.rules: This operative isn’t affected by the marker control bullet point of the Frenzy faction rule. Whenever determining control of a marker, treat this operative’s APL stat as 1 higher. Note this isn’t a change to its APL stat, so any changes are cumulative with this.

abilities.name: War Gong
abilities.rules: Whenever an attack dice would inflict **Critical Dmg** on a friendly FELLGOR RAVAGER operative within 3" of this operative, if this operative doesn’t have one of your Frenzy tokens, you can choose for that attack dice to inflict **Normal Dmg** instead.

actions.name: Gong Knell
effects: • Until the start of this operative’s next activation or until this operative is incapacitated (whichever comes first), whenever an operative is shooting this operative, improve this operative’s Save stat by 1 and ignore the **Piercing** weapon rule.

operatives.name: WARRIOR WITH CLEAVER
operatives.description: Not explicitly stated in source, general description of Fellgor Ravagers applies.
operatives.keywords: FELLGOR RAVAGER, Chaos, Deathknell, Operative

abilities.name: Warrior Frenzy
abilities.rules: Whenever this operative has one of your Frenzy tokens, it cannot be injured. This takes precedence over the normal Frenzy rules.

strategy_ploys.name: PELTING FIREPOWER
strategy_ploys.description: Though it may lack accuracy, the combined firepower of a group of Fellgor Ravagers is rendered lethal by its volume.
strategy_ploys.rules: Not explicitly stated in source, only description given.

strategy_ploys.name: AMBUSH
strategy_ploys.description: Fellgor Ravagers utilise cover and darkness to strike from the shadows and butcher the enemy.
strategy_ploys.rules: Whenever a friendly FELLGOR RAVAGER operative is activated, if its order is changed from Conceal to Engage, it’s ambushing for that activation. Whenever a friendly FELLGOR RAVAGER operative that’s ambushing is fighting, you can retain one of your fails as a normal success instead of discarding it, or you can retain one of your normal successes as a critical success instead. Note that an operative that has one of your Frenzy tokens cannot ambush.

strategy_ploys.name: RECKLESS DETERMINATION
strategy_ploys.description: Not explicitly stated in source.
strategy_ploys.rules: Whenever an enemy operative is shooting an expended friendly FELLGOR RAVAGER operative, if you cannot retain any cover saves, you can retain one of your defence dice as a normal success without rolling it (in addition to a cover save, if any).

strategy_ploys.name: BLESSINGS OF INFECTION
strategy_ploys.description: Not explicitly stated in source.
strategy_ploys.rules: Whenever a friendly FELLGOR RAVAGER operative is fighting or retaliating, you can do one of the following: • If you roll three or more fails, you can discard one of them to retain another as a normal success instead. • If you roll three or more successes, you can discard one of your fails to retain one of your normal successes as a critical success instead.

firefight_ploys.name: PUTRESCENT DEMISE
firefight_ploys.description: As a Fellgor Ravager perishes, their body bursts with Nurgle's blessings.
firefight_ploys.rules: Use this firefight ploy when a friendly FELLGOR RAVAGER operative (excluding MUTOID VERMIN) is incapacitated, before it’s removed from the killzone. Inflict 1 damage (or D3 damage instead if that friendly operative is a NIGHTMARE HULK) on each enemy operative visible to and within 2" of that friendly operative.

firefight_ploys.name: FRIGHTENING ONSLAUGHT
firefight_ploys.description: Nightmare Hulks can strike without pause, with terrifying speed.
firefight_ploys.rules: Use this firefight ploy after a friendly FELLGOR RAVAGER NIGHTMARE HULK operative performs the **Fight** action, if it isn't incapacitated. It can immediately perform a free **Fight** action (you don't have to select the same enemy operative to fight against). This takes precedence over action restrictions.

equipment.name: BRASS ADORNMENTS
equipment.rules: Once per battle, you can use the Animalistic Fury and Wild Rage firefight ploys for 0CP each.

equipment.name: GORE MARKS
equipment.rules: Once per turning point, when a friendly FELLGOR RAVAGER operative is fighting or retaliating, you can use this rule.
